<h3 id="X15863">X(15863)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(15863) = MIDPOINT OF X(8) AND X(80)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3+6*b*c*a^2+(b+c)*(3*b^2-7*b*c+3*c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(15863) = 3*X(8)+X(149) = 7*X(8)+X(9802) = 3*X(10)-2*X(3035) = 3*X(80)-X(149) = 7*X(80)-X(9802) = X(100)-3*X(3679) = 7*X(149)-3*X(9802) = 3*X(214)-4*X(3035) = X(214)-4*X(3036) = 3*X(355)-X(10742) = 3*X(551)-4*X(6667) = 3*X(551)-2*X(12735) = X(3035)-3*X(3036) = 3*X(3679)+X(9897) = 2*X(6702)+X(12531) = 2*X(7972)-3*X(11274)</b>
<p>X(15863) lies on these lines: {1,6702}, {2,7972}, {8,80}, {10,140}, {11,519}, {100,993}, {104,5881}, {355,2800}, {518,6797}, {528,4669}, {551,6667}, {758,1109}, {936,7993}, {958,12331}, {960,15862}, {997,6264}, {1145,3626}, {1320,3632}, {1329,1484}, {1376,12773}, {1387,3244}, {1647,11717}, {1837,15558}, {2550,2801}, {2771,5836}, {2886,11698}, {3617,6224}, {3625,5854}, {3874,10057}, {3898,10073}, {4668,5541}, {4677,10707}, {4691,10609}, {4745,6174}, {4746,12572}, {4996,5258}, {5083,5252}, {5531,9623}, {5600,12460}, {5657,12119}, {5790,6265}, {5840,11362}, {5844,11813}, {5903,12532}, {7968,13976}, {7969,8988}, {7991,10724}, {8666,10090}, {8715,10058}, {10106,12832}, {12245,14217}, {12645,12737}, {14026,14664}</p>
<p>
X(15863) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 12531}, {8, 80}, {100, 9897}, {104, 5881}, {1320, 3632}, {4677, 10707}, {5903, 12532}, {7991, 10724}, {12245, 14217}, {12247, 12751}, {12645, 12737}, {12690, 13996}<br>
X(15863) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 6702), (10, 3036), (214, 10), (1145, 3626), (1317, 1125), (3244, 1387), (3874, 12736), (5882, 6713), (6174, 4745), (11274, 2), (11570, 3754), (11715, 12619), (12735, 6667)<br>X(15863) = complement of X(7972)<br>X(15863) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3679, 9897, 100), (6667, 12735, 551), (10057, 10573, 12736)<br></p>
